name: pocket_pals
description: Steps:  - Clone the repo  - Import `database.sql` file to a MySQL database  - Open Terminal and Run `cd backend`  - Run `npm i` to install required packages for NodeJS backend  - Run `npm start` to start the ExpressJS server   - Open another Terminal and Run `cd frontend`  - Run `npm i` to install required packages for ReactJS frontend  - Run `npm start` to start the ReactJS server
